mapper.select: select r.* from lmt_resource r join lmt_role_resource rr on r.id = rr.resource_id where rr.role_id = #{roleId} and r.status = 1 and rr.status = 1

select r.* from lmt_resource r, join lmt_role_resource rr on rr.resource_id = r.id join lmt_admin_role ar on rr.role_id = ar.role_id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId} and r.status = 1 and rr.status = 1 adn ar.status = 1
